name: Athenora Consulting
goal: Athenora Consulting is a consultancy firm specialised in EU lobbying. We provide relevant information on EU policies to our clients. We enable access to EU decision makers in order to advocate for positive change. We  advise on how to communicate efficiently with the EU Institutions (position papers, press releases, open consultations, seminars, e-lobbying...) and we facilitate contacts with EU media, think tanks and the civil society.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Transport - Energy - Social policies - Investment- Trade Financial services - Digital - Competition - Infrastructure Network industries - Environment - IA - Data - Postal services - Green Deal
